ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Bolland,Eddie Campbell,Geof Darrow,Mike Mignola,Phil Elliott,Rick Geary,Jacques Tardi,François Schuiten,Ed Hillyer,Jacques Lob,Jacques Tardi,Phil Elliott,François Schuiten,Brian Bolland,Ed Hillyer,Rick Geary,Jacques Lob
ComicInfo.Summary:
Featuring some of the finest comic tales from creators across the globe, this premier anthology is a must-have item for the serious collector! Tardi's Roach Killer continues to be reproduced here in stunning black- white-and-red, as Schuiten and Peeters scale The Tower, and Druillet remains Delirius. Fred and Bob, by Cailleteau and Vatine, also continues in this issue. *Story Titles * The Roach Killer part 3 Post Apocalypse The Tower part 4: Of Dreams, Star-Gazing, and Certain Other Things About Which Decency Requires Discretion Convention The Eyeball Kid episode 5: Address To A Leech The Story of Aimee McPherson Delirius: The Further Adventures of Lone Slone Chpter 6
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/cheval-noir-12/4000-33263/
